# autorepeat

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether to repeatedly change the stepper’s value as the user presses and holds a stepper button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var autorepeat: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the user pressing and holding on the stepper repeatedly alters [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/value].

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring the stepper

- **isContinuous**: A Boolean value that determines whether to send value changes during user interaction or after user interaction ends.
- **wraps**: A Boolean value that determines whether the stepper can wrap its value to the minimum or maximum value when incrementing and decrementing the value.
- **minimumValue**: The lowest possible numeric value for the stepper.
- **maximumValue**: The highest possible numeric value for the stepper.
- **stepValue**: The step, or increment, value for the stepper.
